text:
When attempting to load a saved test plan using either the gui or nongui client,  
I get the error in the summary and the application falis to load the plan. This 
happens consistently on WinNT and on Solaris.  It initially happened on Linux 
and now has automagically corrected itself.  I have checked my various 
environments rather carefully--including verifcation that SAXParser is in the 
xerces.jar which is in my classpath.
creator: fklink@acm.org
khammond25@home.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4579 ***

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
